plugin.name: Hibernate
plugin.description: Provides monitoring of Hibernate session manager statistics, EJB3 entities and queries

service.name: Hibernate Statistics

operation.name: clear
operation.description: Clear the collected statistics and begin collecting again

operation.name: viewQueries
operation.description: View statistical information about queries executed by Hibernate
